title: Verdeka Recycle NSL Lda
description: Verdeka Recycle Lda provides recycle project management and implementation in Timor Leste

home.title: Verdeka Recycle
home.description:
This is the recycle project website for Verde TL.   We are in the process of developing an end to end solution for recyclinng plastics in Timor Leste.  This will be support by Caltech and MDF and other partners.  Verde will focus on the collectionn business and Caltech will focus on production of products from the recycled material.  We shall jointly develop a business opportunity for consumption of the recycled projects.

We are currently running a gofundme funding project for impoverished housing
